transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_001099274.1 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000559969.6. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.

transcript.name: t2
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_012461.2 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000399423.8. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.
